childDownloads.title: 2K Reelmaker for College Hoops 2K8
childDownloads.description: A replay editing feature allowing users to compile multiple replay clips and add special effects and audio to create a "highlight reel". There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
